Bill reported about GOP Congressman Mike Pence 's legislation to defund Planned Parenthood adding the ever popular anti-choice meme about taxpayer dollars.

X Factor' has a craziness about it, has an unpredictability about it. I would say it"s more raw."

, who plays scathing cheerleading coach Sue Sylvester on the TV show, believes there are many similarities between the teacher and the straight-talking talent show judge. Jane Lynch Inspired By Simon Cowell For Glee Character. She said: If ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her. He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her. Jane Lynch also admitted she is "amazed" by the public's reaction to Sue and believes people admire her in the same way they respect music mogul Simon Cowell . Michael Vick is coming off the best season of his career, leading the Eagles to an NFC East title. "I'm enjoying the guys and I'm enjoying being out here playing football," he said. This is what you work for. You work hard to get in this position. I'm ecstatic to be here. Michael Vick was selected to start Sunday after leading the NFC with more than 1.5 million votes, far ahead of Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson , the NFC's second-leading vote-getter at 948,410. Bill Clinton Secretary of State Colin Powell says he is voting for Barack Obama . "He has both style and substance. I think he is a transformational figure," Colin Powell said on NBC's "Meet the Press." Barack Obama displayed a steadiness. Showed intellectual vigor. He has a definitive way of doing business that will do us well, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell , a retired US general and a Republican, was once seen as a possible presidential candidate himself.
